attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call upon the prime minister to bring in legisilation to outlaw discrimination against men.

Examples of perfectly legal discrimination are :-

- Women only swimming sessions.

- Women only gyms.

- Bars and clubs that refuse entry to male only groups.

- Women only self defense classes.

- Women only holidays, and hotels.


If the above were for men only there would outcry, so why is it acceptable the other way around?
